headline: Is NetApp’s Shift Toward AI-Focused Cloud Subscriptions Altering The Investment Case For NetApp (NTAP)?
summary: In recent days, NetApp has drawn attention ahead of its upcoming earnings release as analysts weigh its margin resilience amid higher memory costs, evolving AI infrastructure demand, and growth in cloud-based services. Behind the headlines, NetApp’s rapid expansion in Keystone storage-as-a-service and public cloud revenue underscores an ongoing shift toward recurring, subscription-like income streams tied to AI and data modernization workloads. We’ll now examine how NetApp’s progress in...

headline: Is NetApp (NTAP) Pricing In Its Cloud Storage Evolution At Around US$102?
summary: If you are wondering whether NetApp at around US$101.88 is a bargain or already pricing in most of the story, a clear look at its valuation can help you frame that question. The stock has returned 0.6% over the last 7 days and 3.1% over the past month, while the year to date return is a 4.3% decline and the 1 year return is a 16.5% decline, set against longer term returns of 68.3% over 3 years and 79.7% over 5 years. Recent coverage around NetApp has centered on its position in data storage...
